about_the_game:
About This Game


"Neurophobia" is a first-person horror adventure game in which you will explore abandoned research institutes and explore the mysteries by collecting key evidence and deciphering it. Because you are suffering from a nerve needle-like face, you have a sense of fear in the face of the unknown. If you want to understand the mystery, you may wish to explore it!

Summary

The original high-tech pharmaceutical hospital group was abandoned overnight due to unknown reasons. You are a high-tech researcher in this hospital. First of all, you will explore this magical place, but be careful of your choices, which will affect your next process. Due to the psychedelic spirit, if you want to solve the mystery, you will sneak into this abandoned high-tech pharmaceutical hospital group alone to explore. Collect evidence from each room on the entire floor to retrieve the gray industrial chain and the shady behind it, and be careful of the mysterious insiders , Your purpose is to face the real BOSS in your heart.

Playing matters

Always check your surroundings carefully and use the items you must use to avoid death.
To avoid injury, you should always be vigilant and be suspicious of things around you.
Collect inspections and use various tools to conduct detailed investigations of the overall environment and collect evidence
We plan to design this game as a novel and narration style multi-style game mode, the game has two endings.
detailed_description:
About This Game


"Neurophobia" is a first-person horror adventure game in which you will explore abandoned research institutes and explore the mysteries by collecting key evidence and deciphering it. Because you are suffering from a nerve needle-like face, you have a sense of fear in the face of the unknown. If you want to understand the mystery, you may wish to explore it!

Summary

The original high-tech pharmaceutical hospital group was abandoned overnight due to unknown reasons. You are a high-tech researcher in this hospital. First of all, you will explore this magical place, but be careful of your choices, which will affect your next process. Due to the psychedelic spirit, if you want to solve the mystery, you will sneak into this abandoned high-tech pharmaceutical hospital group alone to explore. Collect evidence from each room on the entire floor to retrieve the gray industrial chain and the shady behind it, and be careful of the mysterious insiders , Your purpose is to face the real BOSS in your heart.

Playing matters

Always check your surroundings carefully and use the items you must use to avoid death.
To avoid injury, you should always be vigilant and be suspicious of things around you.
Collect inspections and use various tools to conduct detailed investigations of the overall environment and collect evidence
We plan to design this game as a novel and narration style multi-style game mode, the game has two endings.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTER I5 5400/AMD 1800X
  • Graphics: GTX750/RX540
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTER I7 8700/AMD 2700X
  • Graphics: GTX1060/RX590

short_description: Neurophobia is a personal first-person decryption exploration. In order to get rid of neurological symptoms, the protagonist woke up from a coma for unknown reasons and has come to the research institute. As one of the former researchers, he came to explore the true face of it.
